TwitchRewardName.label: Title of Twitch Reward
TwitchRewardName.tooltip: Specify the name of the Twitch Reward that will trigger this event when detected.

TwitchRewardActivationType.label: Activation Point
TwitchRewardActivationType.tooltip: Set whether the reward should be triggered immediately on reward redemption by viewer, or when the reward is accepted/rejected from the reward queue. Note: twitch currently doesn't return a way to distinguish between Accept or Reject so Reject will still trigger the reward.

TimerLength.label: Time in seconds for reward to add
TimerLength.tooltip: Set the amount of time in seconds to add to the timer.

ResetCommand.label: Command Name for resetting timer on fuckup
ResetCommand.tooltip: Set the command name that can be used by moderator+ to reset timer to closest timer multiple when a mistake is made.

RedeemedSFXPath.label: Path to SFX file
RedeemedSFXPath.tooltip: Specify the path to the SFX effect to trigger.

RedeemedSFXVolume.label: SFX Volume
RedeemedSFXVolume.tooltip: Specify the volume to the SFX effect to trigger.

RedeemedSFXDelay.label: SFX Delay in Seconds
RedeemedSFXDelay.tooltip: Specify the number of seconds to wait before attempting to play next SFX in queue after starting to play this SFX.

FinishedSFXPath.label: Path to SFX file
FinishedSFXPath.tooltip: Specify the path to the SFX effect to trigger.

FinishedSFXVolume.label: SFX Volume
FinishedSFXVolume.tooltip: Specify the volume to the SFX effect to trigger.

TwitchAuthCode.label: Twitch Auth Code
TwitchAuthCode.tooltip: Enter an Auth Code that allows the bot to read channel point redemptions on the channel being watched.

btnGetToken.label: Get Token
btnGetToken.tooltip: Generate an Auth Code for the watched twitch account with permissions to read channel point redemptions.

btnDeleteSavedTokens.label: Delete Saved Tokens
btnDeleteSavedTokens.tooltip: Clear out saved tokens so that a new Authorization Code can be used.

btnRefreshTokens.label: Refresh Saved Tokens
btnRefreshTokens.tooltip: Manually trigger a refresh of access token using refresh token..
